# Vendored Python packages for iOS client
# These packages are copied to iOS bundle to ensure version consistency

# Flask ecosystem (critical for HTML rendering)
flask==3.1.2
jinja2==3.1.6
werkzeug==3.1.5
markupsafe==3.0.3
click==8.3.1
itsdangerous==2.2.0
blinker==1.9.0

# HTTP client
requests==2.32.5
urllib3==2.6.3
certifi==2026.1.4
charset-normalizer==3.4.4
idna==3.11

# Configuration
python-dotenv==1.1.0

# MD.ai sync dependencies (pure Python)
retrying==1.3.4
tqdm==4.67.1
arrow==1.3.0
python-dateutil==2.9.0.post0
types-python-dateutil==2.9.0.20241206
